response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Given its value and quality, I understand its worth to you is $12,000. Considering this, I propose to sell it to you for $14,000. This price not only reflects the product's true value but also allows me to maintain a reasonable profit margin. I look forward to hearing your decision.", "product_price": 14000}
